price: For you approach men lustfully instead of women; you are but a transgressing people[30].”
arabic: إِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهۡوَةٗ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ مُّسۡرِفُونَ
footnotes: [30] Because they transgressed the limits of moderation.
